text:
1. Grab a knife
2. Place the cutting board on a stable surface
3. Position the ingredients on the cutting board
4. Hold the knife with a firm grip
5. Position the knife above the ingredients
6. Apply downward pressure with the knife
7. Move the knife in a slicing motion
8. Repeat the slicing motion until desired cuts are achieved
9. Transfer the cut ingredients to a separate container or cooking vessel
